title: Interactive Map
content:
interactive map: all the regions, points of interest and landmarks available. Our Baldur's Gate 3 Interactive Map helps you keep track of everything you've picked up, with a full list of Quests, and more.

Note that decisions while completing Quests may alter your vision of the world, turning some NPCs into Enemies or even Enemies into allies, or even locking you out into certain events or Quests

Baldur's Gate 3 Map Checklist

VIP Members will also be able to see their completion rates and keep
